Mr Eric Schmidt said his new role would concentrate on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . Mr Sergey Brin will devote his time to "strategic projects", particularly developing new products. The management changes came as Google announced a 22pc increase in pre-tax profits in the three months to the end
